column4: hi guys, i have a rack server IBM x3650 having 6 hdd of 146 gb each. One of these has bad sectors and is not working fine. can anyone tell me how can i detect which one is crashed?
a s.m.a.r.t analysis tool should show something ifthe hd is still somewhat operable..
a s.m.a.r.t capable hd keeps it's internal error database.. a software smart tool can query this database
thanks :) and DarwinSurvivor thanks you too :)
